meanings.definition: A variety of open sandwiches served as a buffet.
meanings.sent1: At the party, there were delicious smorgs with different toppings.
meanings.sent2: I love going to the buffet and trying all the different smorgs.
meanings.sent3: The smorgs at the event were so cute, each one like a tiny work of art.
meanings.sent4: The smorgs on the platter looked like a colorful mosaic of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The smorgs were so tempting, I couldn't resist trying each one.

meanings.definition: To eat a meal consisting of a variety of small dishes.
meanings.sent1: Let's smorgs tonight and enjoy a little bit of everything.
meanings.sent2: When we go out to eat, I like to smorgs and taste different flavors.
meanings.sent3: We decided to smorgs for dinner, trying a bit of everything on the menu.
meanings.sent4: She loves to smorgs at parties, sampling all the different dishes.
meanings.sent5: Smorgsing allows you to experience a range of flavors in one meal.
